titleInfo.title: ‘ENLARGED PLAN AND SECTIONS to accompany plan of work connected with the defence of the MAIN PASS at ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing paper with additions in pencilDimensions:692 x 802 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Includes two figures showing proposed tower and bridge across Main Pass with sections and elevations. Contains explanatory note in the right centre of sheet. Landmarks lettered for reference which correspond with symbols on the ‘OUTLINE PLAN of the WORKS CONNECTED WITH THE DEFENCE of the MAIN PASS at ADEN’ at IOR/X/3252.Inscriptions:On recto, bottom left-hand corner:‘Copied in the Chief Engrs. Office Bombay 26th September 1846’. And below: ‘146’.On verso, bottom left-hand corner with bleed-through into the recto:‘In Bombay Secret Letter No. 113 of 1846 Recd. via Southampton 10th Novr. 1846 Aden Fortifications’.
